strings.otherOverviewDetail: The IFRC provides both strategic and technical support in partnerships and resource mobilisation to National Societies who are working to increase their capacity. The IFRC partnership and resource mobilisation function provides support to the operational leadership, through engagement with partners and donors, coordination of contributions, resource mobilisation efforts, and pledge management, among others. In addition, the function may support National Societies in building their capacities to develop domestic fundraising portfolios. The IFRC also coordinates global initiatives when the IFRC is best placed to do so.
strings.rapidResponseDetail: Details about the expectations for this specialty can be found in the role profiles:
strings.linkOne: Rapid Response Strategic Partnerships and Resource Mobilisation (SPRM) Officer role profile
strings.linkTwo: Rapid Response Strategic Partnerships and Resource Mobilisation (SPRM) Coordinator role profile
